page.title: 18SPORTS AND LEISURE
page.content: BIRMINGHAM CITY FOOTBALL CLUBS TRAINING GROUND IS IN DAMSON LANE. PLAYERS COME TO THE GROUND EVERY MORNING TO PRACTICE THEIR FOOTBALL SKILLS. THE GROUND IS ALSO USED FOR JUNIOR INTERMEDIATE MATCHES. THE PAVILION SPORTS CLUB IN DAMSON LANE PROVIDES FACILITIES FOR FOOTBALL MATCHES, AEROBICS AND THERE IS A 12 BORE SHOOTING RANGE. THERE IS ALSO A GOLF DRIVING RANGE. BIRMINGHAM WELSH RUGBY CLUB IN CLOCK LANE IS WHERE RUGBY MATCHES AND PRACTICES TAKE PLACE FOR MEMBERS. MATCHES ARE HELD EVERY WEEKEND DURING THE RUGBY SEASON. THERE IS ALSO A BAR AND SOCIAL FACILITIES. THERE ARE ALSO PLAYING FIELDS NEXT TO BICKENHILL CHURCH WHERE LOCAL YOUTH GROUPS PLAY FOOTBALL. MANY PEOPLE KEEP HORSES AND PRACTICE SHOW-JUMPING IN THE FIELDS AROUND BICKENHILL.
